The close presence on all central trading servers of major exchanges, liquidity providers, banks and other financial institutions allows us to reduce the request time as much as possible, down to hundredths of milliseconds.

Cryptocurrency exchange
licenses

The process of obtaining licenses to run the cryptocurrencies exchange activities is a complicated process that requires time and serious preparation. Only several jurisdictions allows to obtain a license to engage in activities related to cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology.

Obtaining a permission to exchange cryptocurrencies is a long and complicated process.

Professional support
is the key to success in resolving this issue.

Legal status
of cryptocurrencies

Today, most countries do not have a unified global legal framework and practice to control cryptocurrencies.

Some jurisdictions are trying to meet the conditions of a rapidly changing industry and developing a legislation for virtual money, while other jurisdictions are trying to impose strict measures to control and prohibit activities with cryptocurrencies and their mining.

Contact us, if you are planning to join the world of electronic money.

are top-class specialists!
